smart_goals.description: Maintain systolic blood pressure below 130 mmHg and diastolic blood pressure below 85 mmHg in the next 6 months. Monitor blood pressure readings twice a day for 180 days and calculate the average of the daily readings.
Reduce cholesterol level to below 200 mg/dL within the next 3 months. Monitor cholesterol levels weekly for 12 weeks and adjust diet and medication accordingly.
Maintain daily steps above 5000 for the next 3 months. Use a fitness tracker to record daily steps and aim for an average of 5000 steps per day over this period.
